faction_profile.name: 상관세가 (Shangguan Family / 上官世家)
alias: 도혼상관세가 (Blade Soul Shangguan / 刀魂上官世家)

location.history: Rose to prominence during the Tang Dynasty.

status.tier: Prestigious Family (Myeongmun-ga), but often just below the 'Five Great Families' (Odaesega).
status.rival: Danmok Family (단목세가 - Sword vs Blade rivalry).

growth_strategy: Buying rare martial arts manuals and hiring master ronin.
Expanding influence through economic pressure rather than brute force.
martial_trait: Blade Soul (Dao Soul / 刀魂): Despite their merchant nature, they are famous for Blade Arts.
Yin Affinity: Their core internal art is better suited for women, leading to powerful female martial artists.

internal_energy.name: 일월신기공 (Sun and Moon Divine Qi Art / 日月神氣功)
internal_energy.irony: More suitable for women than men. A result of purchasing arts rather than developing a bloodline-specific one.
internal_energy.narrative_hook: The daughter/heiress might be stronger than the son.

movement: 벽월유보 (Jade Moon Roaming Step) - Elegant, dance-like movement.

narrative_role: The wealthy patron or financier of the Wulin Alliance.
A faction where the 'Young Miss' (Sojou) is the true powerhouse due to the Yin-affinity art.
Antagonists who try to solve problems with bribery.
Rivals to the Danmok Family (Sword vs Blade).
